jobs.title: Graphic Designer – Imper (Saleskit)
jobs.description: Design of business materials such as presentations, lanyards, leaflets, LinkedIn banners.

jobs.title: Graphic Designer & Video Editor – JVS GROUP
jobs.description: Creating graphic and video designs for exhibitions and concerts, including TV commercials, promo videos. 2D animations in After Effects. Designing visuals for social media, HTML5/PPC banners, brochures, and merchandise. Managing large-scale outdoor campaigns such as billboards, venue graphics, and public transport wraps. Producing photography, influencer interviews, and editing videos. Occasionally producing 3D visualizations using Unreal Engine and Cinema 4D. Editing websites using Wix and developing comprehensive branding materials, including logos.

jobs.title: DTP Operator – GZ Media
jobs.description: Prepared data for printing. Performed color correction on prints. Collaborated on the production of promotional materials. Operated printing machines.
